forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High around 15C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. Slight chance of a rain shower. High 59F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with rain developing after midnight. Low near 10C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain late. Low near 50F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and damp with rain early...then becoming partly cloudy. Low 41F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: A mainly sunny sky. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 40F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High around 55F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 47F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%.
